replicate.title: Replicate

huggingFace.title: Hugging Face

submitPlatform.title: Submit Your Platform

visibility.title: Increased Visibility
visibility.description: Reach thousands of AI engineers, data scientists, and developers actively looking for platforms like yours.

traffic.title: Qualified Traffic
traffic.description: Drive highly targeted visitors to your platform who are already interested in AI solutions.

insights.description: Gain access to anonymized data about how users discover and engage with your platform.

integration.title: Integration Opportunities
integration.description: Potential for deeper integration and partnership opportunities with Model Guru.

form.title: Platform Details

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Please describe your platform and its key features (max 500 characters)

features.label: Key Features (comma separated)
features.placeholder: e.g., API access, Custom models, Free tier

logo.label: Platform Logo
logo.note: Recommended: Square logo, minimum 200x200px (PNG or SVG preferred)

terms.label: I agree to the Terms and Conditions for platform listings

form.note: * Required fields. All submissions will be reviewed before being published. This typically takes 3-5 business days.
